chapter.title: Problem determination
chapter.para: In the event you have difficulties with an &agentabbrev; application, the following procedures may be helpful.

section.title: System operator messages
section.para: When &agentabbrev; encounters a problem processing a Syslog transaction it may send a message to the system operator message queue. Use the DSPMSG command to view these messages. Many of the messages have second level text. You can use F1 or the HELP key to view this text.

section.title: Application logging
section.para: The Alliance TCP client applications will create extra diagnostic information when the option for application logging is enabled. You should restart the subsystem when changing the logging option. When application logging is enabled there will be additional information written to the job log and to output spooled files in the job.
